Package distibuted.interfaces

Interface ClientInterface

All Superinterfaces:
CommonGoalView, GameView, LivingRoomView, PersonalGoalView, PlayerChatView, PlayerView, Remote, ShelfView, UserView, ViewCollection
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientEndPoint, ServerSocketHandler
public interface ClientInterface extends Remote, ViewCollection
This interface is a collection of interfaces and contains all the methods a server can call on client

    • bind

      void bind(ServerInterface server) throws RemoteException
      This method binds a client to a server
      Parameters:
      server - the ServerInterface of the server that client have to bind to
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the binding fails
